Do something @EnvAgencyMids Stop @RedIndustries2 accepting waste, cap it off @WalleysL  landfill. Monitor. #StopTheStink Do something. Stop letting Red gas the residents of Newcastle Under Lyme.

Staggeringly high Hydrogen Sulphide levels being measured at the EA testing site in April near Whaley’s & 10 times worse at night!! Man-made or not seems urgent question as people aren’t sleeping at night @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @WHO https://t.co/ORwkI7hT4Z

Care to comment @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @pow_rebecca @MattHancock @BorisJohnson transparency, regulation, a plan with timescales, clean air that’s is all we want - act now, we can’t breathe @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/9rujdGNaBI

tweets.text:
Horses are wonderful animals. Majestic and trustworthy animals. 

Contrast this with Walleys Quarry Landfill run by @RedIndustries2 who simply don’t care.  

They poison a town and don’t care if it’s people or horses.  

Come on @EnvAgencyMids get the whip and sort it. https://t.co/JqHHm7JFqa

@Bigdwazda @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @DrMariaNeira @AntheaTurner @JuliaBradbury @mwilliamsthomas Shocking it’s still so high after the colossal figures in March! Yes we know the figure is averaged out over 24 hours for the reports but these readings are massive for a one time hit of it. And let’s be honest @EnvAgencyMids we all know it lasts longer indoors #stopthestink https://t.co/iFSXPTBS7O

We’re holding a #covidsafe #community session on Wed 26 May to answer residents’ questions & give you the latest on regulation of #WalleysQuarry. 

Details on how to join below 👇

We’ll also make the session available afterwards for those who can’t join on the day. https://t.co/njxpZMmOOL

That’s what I think, @EleanorO16, how else can you explain the stated fact that they are all doing their best, yet it is business as usual at Walleys whilst local complaints are escalating? Last night was atrocious all round! @Kevin_Healey @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency https://t.co/p5zjJj16Em

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency Seriously @EnvAgency do you really expect a company who knows they'll be "punished " when they get back to compliance to actually get back into compliance . It defies sense and logic .
@DefraGovUK @KeepBritainTidy Defra also ruins the environment through non regulation , incompetence and poor leadership of @EnvAgency .

@StinkStopthe #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off just seen this on fb , I’m now going to email a very long email detailing everything fromnow on . @EnvAgencyMids you really are causing rising anger in north staffs now . https://t.co/tSg5fX6jFT

Not only did the  @EnvAgency say the landfill is not behaving as they would expect it to with the measures they also have no idea why the gas is so strong& there are health harms 4.6miles away - why are alarm bells not ringing about this out of control landfill? #stopthestink https://t.co/EAig4u5Skt

If a fire is out of control then don't they starve it of fuel to stop it ? if so why add more fuel to this fire , wouldn't it be better to suspend dumping and get it under control ? @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency

@SianieRoo @alan49479451 @a_rambling_man @BarristerSecret @JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @Unchecked_UK @EnvAgency Indeed. At least I can say @TheENDSReport, which I write for, is on the case. I have heard some shocking things about the landfill that still have not entered the public domain. Watch this space.

Daily dose of poisonous hydrogen sulphide has arrived early in Hartshill-c5 miles from Walleys Landfill-today. Normally get gassed evening/night time. No chance we can go along with government COVID guidance to keep homes ventilated.  #StopTheStink @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids

We're looking forward to #Confluence21 – 4 virtual events in the same week starting 8 June. 

We're showcasing what we've achieved with our partners eg the Natural Flood Management in #Calderdale work #NFM @Calderdale @slowtheflow_UK @HardcastleNT @nationaltrust @EnvAgencyYNE 
👇 https://t.co/Y3b3VCTNlj

Heading to the beach this half term? There are 149 monitored bathing waters along the Devon and Cornwall coast, the vast majority of which have Excellent or Good water quality. More details at Swimfo: https://t.co/vjFBpfnYmg https://t.co/jsZ31ibVPe

The dolphin cap has been lifted into place! To minimise risks & increase efficiency it was fabricated on dry ground, then moved & installed in a single lift avoiding the need to work over water. Brilliant work by all involved @BAMNuttall @Red7Marine @MottMacDonald @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/B6jevZsJJb
@EnvAgencyMids How many breaches are required before you close them down please? It’s a serious question @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink #resign

@EnvAgencyMids What’s the plan? What’s the root cause of the toxic gas?What are the plan’s milestones & delivery dates? What progress have @RedIndustries2 made against milestones? @ClareDinnis it appears you are just hoping the malodorous vapour goes- no plan, no confidence #stopthestink
@EnvAgencyMids Stop challenging. Start prosecuting. At the very least stop them operating until they are compliant
